description: An Advisory sent when a Server has run out of disk space
title: io.nats.jetstream.advisory.v1.server_out_of_space

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

stream.description: The Stream that triggered the out of space event

server.description: The server name that ran out of space

server_id.description: The server ID that ran out of space

cluster.description: The cluster the server is in
